QuestData.Title: Seafaring Necessities
QuestData.Description:
She might not be much to look at, but this boat will take me back to Boralus.
Before my voyage can begin, I'll need a few seafaring necessities.
Luckily, everything I need can be found in the Ashvane encampment.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect a Seafaring Hat, Nautical Map, and Weathered Spyglass.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Randall Redmond in Redrock Harbor.
